mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, user_email, programme_id, programme_name, signature, management_signature, programme_charge_signature, status, apply_date
mapper.insert: insert into user_application (user_id, user_name, user_email, programme_id, programme_name, signature, management_signature, programme_charge_signature, status, apply_date) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{programmeId}, #{programmeName}, #{signature}, #{managementSignature}, #{programmeInChargeSignature}, #{status}, #{applyDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_application where user_id = #{userId} and programme_id = #{programmeId}
mapper.update: update user_application set status = #{status} where id = #{appId}
update user_application set signature = #{signature} where id = #{appId}
